title: Pulsefire ezreal still worth buying?
body:
Title says it all... Is the ultimate skin (3250 RP) Pulsfire ezreal still worth buying? I've been playing ezreal nonstop lately and was thinking of buying it. It's personally my second favorite ultimate skin with DJ sona being the first. I've never really like Sporit guard udyr, as I think of it more of a legendary skin due its lack of design and performance. However, the reason I'm not considering getting DJ sona is because I don't really play her anymore. I was just wondering what you guys personally think of Pulsefire ezreal...

Comment on your thoughts!

replies.body:
It has been. You can see the difference here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_RXjDym_cJE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=byrYeCYQ1K8
I don't think so. Personally I own it but it's a bit clunky with Q's and such. It's not the best skin. Maybe later down the line if it gets an update. I use Striker Ezreal over it =/

Agreed, I play Ez quite a bit. I am still waiting for an update. I like to transition depending on position I play. Striker for AI's, TPA for ADC (because it is red and I am symbolic as all fck), Frosted for Sup (easy to tell apart from the fray) and Debonair top AD (because I want to die constantly in style), but I usually use Pulsefire for Mid anyways, because it is blue and I play AP mid... Soooo yeah. :P 

In the end, nice to have, but maybe wait for the update first. It is still a better skin if you are considering a change in particle colours.
